trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around October 18th 2012
Summary: While working at a college i happened to look up to the sky and a light, at first i did not think anything of it, but after a minute or two i realized that it was not moving and it was getting brighter and dimmer something like turn of on and off a light.
divs: Sighting DetailsON THE MORNING OF 10-18-12 I WAS AT WORK AT A COLLEGE CAMPUS DRIVING, I STOPPED FOR A WHILE TO STRETCH MY LEGS. I HAPPEN TO LOOK UP TO THE SKY AND OBSERVED A LIGHT. AT FIRST I DID NOT THINK ANYTHING OF IT, BUT AFTER A MINUTE OR SO I REALIZED IT WAS NOT MOVING AT ALL. I TOOK OUT MY CELL PHONE TO RECORD THIS LIGHT. THIS LIGHT WAS NOT MOVING AT ALL, IT LOOKED LIKE IT WAS GETTING BRIGHTER THEN DIMMER, ALMOST LIKE TURNING ON AND OFF A LIGHT SWITCH OR FLASH LIGHT. IT DID THIS FOR APPROXIMATELY 10 MIN. THIS LIGHT JUST DISAPPEARED WHEN AN AIRPLANE HAPPEN TO BE FLYING BY. I WAS SO INTRIGUED BY THIS I JUST NEEDED TO KNOW WHAT THIS WAS. I KNOW IT WAS NOT AN AIRPLANE NOR A HELICOPTER NOR A BALLOON. I THOUGHT IT MIGHT BE A BLIMP BUT I REALLY DOUBT THAT VERY MUCH.
